description: Mouse Trap, each mouse will be represented by a d6 dice, we must round them all up each turn get next to one mouse and try to get a 3 of a kind with its number in 4 rolls, if you failed to get a 3 of a kind in 4 rolls on your turn loose 2 health, once all the mice havce been caught place a door to leave the room
additionalData: Any other data you'd like to store for this tile
